data.name: XModeChangeBroadcaster
desc: broadcasts changes in an object's internal mode.

methods.name: addModeChangeApproveListener
desc: adds the given listener to the list of components to be notified when the mode is about to change.

methods.name: addModeChangeListener
desc: adds the given listener to the list of components to be notified when the mode changes.

methods.name: removeModeChangeApproveListener
desc: remove the given listener from the list of components to be notified when the mode is about to change.

methods.name: removeModeChangeListener
desc: removes the given listener from the list of components to be notified when the mode changes.
